thread.section_title: Wainscoting America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wainscoting America | wainscotingamerica.com
thread.title: David H.
thread.title_full: Wainscoting America reviewed by David H.

author: David H.
title: David H.
text: I found Wainscoting America through a Google search and was immediately impressed by their website and customization options. Things only got better when I eMailed them some questions about a project and Bob Muckle worked with me over the course of a week to refine and custom design the panels for my project, sending multiple CAD drawings (with tolerance down to 1/32"!). The panels arrived about a 10 days after ordering (had to ship from the east coast to California) and I was impressed, yet again, by the care in packaging. Each panel was in a cardboard box, encased in expanding foam so that the panel was fully protected. The panels themselves are exactly as shown in the CAD drawing and perfect. I'm SO glad I didn't try making them -- Wainscoting America should be everybody's go-to for wainscoting, trim, baseboard, etc.
